channel.title: CVE Feed for The PostgreSQL Global Development Group -- postgresql
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The PostgreSQL Global Development Group -- postgresql

item.title: CVE-2018-1058|2024-09-17T03:22:50.533Z -- the%20postgresql%20global%20development%20group -- postgresql
item.description: A flaw was found in the way Postgresql allowed a user to modify the behavior of a query for other users. An attacker with a user account could use this flaw to execute code with the permissions of superuser in the database. Versions 9.3 through 10 are affected.
